sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment } from "react"; import { elements } from "./_data"; import Element from "./Element"; document.title = "The Periodic Table of Elements"; class PeriodicTable extends Component { state = { showInfo: false, element: {}, }; showInfo = (num) => { this.setState({ showInfo: true, element: elements[num] }); }; closeInfo = () => { this.setState({ showInfo: false }); }; render() { let { name, summary, symbol, category, number, source, appearance, atomic_mass, molar_heat, density, melt, boil, } = this.state.element; return (

The Periodic Table of Elements

{/* Information Table */} {this.state.showInfo ? (
{number}
{symbol}
{name}
Close [×]

{name}

{category} {appearance ? (
Appearance: {appearance}
) : ( "" )}
Atomic Mass: {atomic_mass} | Density: {density} {molar_heat ? | Molar Heat: {molar_heat} : ""} {melt ? | Melt: {melt}K : ""} {boil ? | Boil: {boil}K : ""}
{summary} ...
) : ( "" )} {/* Lanthanoids split */} {/* Actinoids split */} {/* Lanthenoids */} {/* Actionoids */}

2018

); } } export default PeriodicTable;
